document_name: Strengthening the Operational and Financial Sustainability of the NPAS

outputs.output_descr: The project's goal is to safeguard Jamaica's globally significant biodiversity. The project's objective is to consolidate the operational and financial sustainability of Jamaica's national system of protected areas. The objective will be achieved through three components: (1) Strengthening of planning and revenue generation; (2) Rationalizing and integrating the national system of protected areas; and, (3) Increasing the effectiveness of protected area management.

project_descr: Strengthening the operational and financial sustainability of the National Protected Area System
project_title: Strengthening sustainability of NPAS in Jamaica
